A Hidden Gem.  We were directed to Gorria from a friend who works in the area.  We were in the mood for great steaks after 2 weeks of mostly seafood and tapas.  Gorria butchers their own meat and cooks it to perfection.  This place has been here for a long time and it gets packed with locals.  Great wine list and best service we had in Barcelona... the waiters all look to be in their 60s, 70s and some even older, but they are obvious in their love and enjoyment of their careers
